    Zecon Medicare Sdn Bhd Job Vacancies 2021 - HOTEL MANAGER

    February 22, 2021

    TOC

    • Vacancy
    • How To Apply

    Zecon Medicare Sdn Bhd job vacancies 2021 for HOTEL MANAGER position which based in Cheras. Jawatan kosong Zecon Medicare Sdn Bhd 2021 terkini untuk kekosongan HOTEL MANAGER penempatan di Cheras.

    Vacancy

    • HOTEL MANAGER

    If you are a person with pleasant yet strong personality, great at networking, a go-getter driven by goals and targets, a problem solver, you have a tenacious never give-up attitude, values having a plan and executing it with perfection, persuasive & influential and you always lead others by example, then you’re the right candidate for this position and WE WANT YOU!

    We are an Organization that manages a Boutique Hotel in a niche market and we are about to embark on a journey into the Hospitality Industry. We are looking for a Leader that has more than 10 years of experience in the hospitality industry where 5 years of it is in managerial position. We want someone who is able to build an effective team and aligned them towards achieving Vision and Goals of our Organization.

    ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES

    · Develop and implement Operations Strategy to ensure that the Hotel is running with optimum efficiency and meet the target customer’s needs

    · Lead and execute sales and marketing plans to generate consistent revenue and to manage profitability of the Hotel

    · Build a culture of service excellence that will exceed Guest Expectations

    · Responsible for the preparation and presentation of the Hotels Operating Budget, Marketing and Sales Plan, Financial Report to Senior Management of our Organization

    · Provide effective Leadership to all team members that will continuously improve employee engagement and satisfaction

    · Ensure full compliance to Hotel’s Standard Operating Procedures, Service Standards and other Legal Requirements

    CANDIDATE’S PROFILE

    · Degree from any Accredited University in Business Administration, Hotel and Restaurant Management or other related Major

    · Extensive experience in the Hospitality Industry with Management capabilities

    · Team player and leads from the front, hands on

    · Excellent customer service, listening, organizing and problem solving skills

    · Creative, result-oriented, a planner and persistent individual that will lead others to achieve targets and goals
    If you meet all of the criteria above, we would like to hear from you.

    Application Deadline: 12/03/2021

    Job Types: Full-time, Contract

    Benefits:

    • Flexible schedule
    • Health insurance

    Schedule:

    • Flexible hours

    Supplemental Pay:

    • Performance bonus

    COVID-19 considerations:
    We practice stringent Covid-19 SOP to avoid any spread of the virus in our workplace and to our employees

    Experience:

    • Hospitality: 10 years (Preferred)

    Education:

    • Bachelor's (Preferred)

    How To Apply

    Are you looking for new challenge and job opportunity in hotel industry this 2021 ? Just apply this HOTEL MANAGER job online through Indeed Malaysia Apply Online
